name: Raydium
reason: The original Toll Booth. High utility, but tokenomics have historically been highly inflationary. Pure rent-seeking.

name: Orca
reason: Concentrated Liquidity AMM. Better tokenomics than Raydium, but still an intermediary tax on the system.

name: Solend (Save)
reason: The 'Bank of Solana'. Useful for leverage, but carries smart contract risk and acts as a fiat multiplier.

name: Lifinity
reason: Proactive Market Maker. Generates real revenue from trading spreads and buys back tokens. High merit model.

name: Marinade
reason: Governance token for the LST protocol. Purely bureaucratic utility (voting).

name: Step Finance
reason: The 'Bloomberg Terminal' of Solana. Provides data utility. Honest business model.

name: Mango Markets
reason: Governance token with heavy regulatory baggage (SEC) and exploit history. High risk.

name: Tulip Protocol
reason: Leveraged Yield Farming. A mechanism for amplifying risk. Low utility in a 'Hard Money' economy.
